title: Program question
body: The program SkinPreview is eligible for league of legends or you will get banned? Because I heard is eligible.......

replies.body:
It's tough for us to say what is and isn't okay to use with League, since we don't develop third-party applications. At any point, the developer could implement a Feature that could cause your account to be suspended. In general, we take action when a program can provide a competitive advantage to a player.

Let me know if you have any questions.
